alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Walworth, southwestern Waukesha and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elkhorn, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkhorn, Delavan, Lake Geneva, Mukwonago, East Troy, Williams Bay, Vernon, North Prairie, Palmyra, Big Bend, Como, Potter Lake, La Grange, Eagle, Abells Corners, Tibbets, Millard, Genesee, Troy Center and Nws Milwaukee/sullivan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Wisconsin.
